publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4322 Mr David Davidson: Word 06 Festival - Aberdeen 12 to 14 May 2006—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of the sixth Word – University of Aberdeen Writers’ Festival on the programme for this year’s festival, which runs from 12 to 14 May 2006; notes that this festival brings together a number of celebrities and international authors with talented authors from the north east and, by so doing, showcases the very best in literature in the Aberdeen area; further notes the involvement of local young people in the very diverse and stimulating programme, and wishes well all those involved in this event which puts Aberdeen and the north east on the literature and cultural map.

S2M-4322 Word 06 Festival - Aberdeen 12 to 14 May 2006 (lodged on 2 May 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Alex Johnstone*, Murdo Fraser*, Robin Harper*, Brian Adam*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Rob Gibson*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S2M-4322 Word 06 Festival - Aberdeen 12 to 14 May 2006 (lodged on 2 May 2006) Shiona Baird*, Eleanor Scott*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Tommy Sheridan*, Patrick Harvie*, Frances Curran*

S2M-4322 Mr David Davidson: Word 06 Festival - Aberdeen 12 to 14 May 2006—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of the sixth Word – University of Aberdeen Writers’ Festival on the programme for this year’s festival, which runs from 12 to 14 May 2006; notes that this festival brings together a number of celebrities and international authors with talented authors from the north east and, by so doing, showcases the very best in literature in the Aberdeen area; further notes the involvement of local young people in the very diverse and stimulating programme, and wishes well all those involved in this event which puts Aberdeen and the north east on the literature and cultural map. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Alex Johnstone, Murdo Fraser, Robin Harper, Brian Adam, Mrs Nanette Milne, Rob Gibson, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mr Frank McAveety, Shiona Baird, Eleanor Scott, Ms Maureen Watt, Tommy Sheridan, Patrick Harvie, Frances Curran, Nora Radcliffe*, John Scott*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*
S2M-4322 Word 06 Festival - Aberdeen 12 to 14 May 2006 (lodged on 2 May 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4322 Word 06 Festival - Aberdeen 12 to 14 May 2006 (lodged on 2 May 2006) Dave Petrie*
S2M-4322 Word 06 Festival - Aberdeen 12 to 14 May 2006 (lodged on 2 May 2006) Fiona Hyslop*
